feature_model.name: Odoo requirements definition
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Odoo-SPL(_r) :g (_r_1) [1,*] : Sale(_r_1_2) : Purchase(_r_1_3) : Inventory(_r_1_4) :m Accounting(_r_7) :m Product(_r_7_8) :m Analytic(_r_7_9) :m Portal(_r_7_10) :m Base-setup(_r_7_11) :m Web-planner(_r_7_12)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_1:~_r_1_2 or _r_7 constraint_2:~_r_1_3 or _r_7 constraint_3:~_r_1_4 or _r_7
